question: I have recently gone about making my own business on the internet. I was wondering if the money made from business halaal or haraam?
answer:
QUESTION
On the web site i will be adverstising clubs, pubs, restaurants, cinemas and taxis. i will be advertising these things and charge a few. I am not sure if this is ok to do, beacuse some of the places sell alcohol.Please help me.
ANSWER


Share:
Almighty Allah Ta?ala says, ?And do not aid in sin ?? (Maaidah)

To advertise any avenue that engages in sinful activities, for example, cinemas, pubs, or any avenues that is in commonly known to gather and associate in immoral activities, for example, clubs and pubs will be assisting in sin, hence, not permissible.

As regards advertising restaurants, it is permissible if they are strictly Halaal. If they sell alcohol, it is not permissible to advertise such outlets even if they claim to sell Halaal.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
